LanguageData.Bullet_FireballGrenadeLauncher.label: incendiary quantumbolt
LanguageData.GrenadeArmy.label: Shrapnel
LanguageData.GrenadeDeath.label: Deathcloud
LanguageData.GrenadeDisintegrator.label: disintegration bomb
LanguageData.GrenadeNapalm.label: Inferno
LanguageData.GrenadePlasma.label: Plasma
LanguageData.GrenadeWarhead.label: nuclear warhead
LanguageData.Gun_FireballGrenadeLauncher.label: Fireball Launcher
LanguageData.Gun_FireballGrenadeLauncher.description:
A wide-barreled multi launcher. The shells create heavy incendiary explosions on impact. The quickshot mechanism can burst out up to 5 grenades at once. A technical marvel and real beauty for any heavy gunner.
Lost Forsaken Tech.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeArmy.label: Army grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeArmy.description:
Adopted standard army design fragmentation grenade. It packs a special explosive device in a round housing for a vast detonation. Wide spreaded, pretty oldschool and easy to craft.
The belt is loaded with these basies.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDeath.label: Death container
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDeath.description:
Grenade with a death cloud blasting composition. Space Marines call this 'Pandoras Box' in fear of its horrifying effect. In times before adoptive medical emergency modules (A3Ms) were integrated as military standard, this planetary havoc came above many humanoid as xenomorphic beings. Something is written in small letters underneath...
Caution: Open at your own risk. Virus will outbreak of containment.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDisintegrator.label: Disintegrator
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDisintegrator.description:
Grenade with a disintegration blasting composition. Its blueprint underlies an ultratech assembling. Creates a small wave of pure destruction, while beeing liftable without additional servomotors for the grenadier.
The belt is loaded with these babies.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeNapalm.label: Napalm bomb
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeNapalm.description:
Special grenade with a napalm blasting composition. A real firestarter due to is hydrophobic characteristics. Detonates in a huge wave of flames.
Alias: The Rainmaker.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadePlasma.label: Plasma grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadePlasma.description:
Grenade with a smolder blasting composition. Its ultratech blueprint originates from the nebula wars, when two whole universes fought each other. The detained plasma melts through any kind of armor, especially through such, which is sensible to high temperature fluctuations by particle mixtures on atomic-molecular level. Requires rare materials.
The belt is loaded with these babies.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeWarhead.label: Atomic Bomb
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeWarhead.description:
Grenade with an ultra-tech warhead powered by a grain of evaine antimatter. Usually used by forsaken grenadiers and war machines, it creates a huge explosion and starts fires around the detonation point.
Fragile and dangerous. Handle with care.
